title: Devastated teen blasts restaurant chain after interviewer mocks her ‘one minute after leaving’ with laughing emoji for failing to get job
text:
7 And this was he response to Megan 
“At the end of the interview, I asked when I would hear back. She told me it was never more than a few days and she had my email. But I got the texts a few seconds after leaving. 
“I was shocked. The least she should have given me was some proper feedback. 
“And the laughing face emoji was so unprofessional. It was a really bitchy thing to do.” RELATED STORIES SCUMMY MUMMY Karen Matthews pictured working in a charity shop just a day after drama about daughter's fake kidnap MUM's sex with boys Married mum, 39, performed 'striptease' for schoolboys before inviting three into her bedroom for sex crash inferno A12 lorry crash 'driver' desperately tried to put out raging flames after truck plunged from bridge onto busy dual carriageway 'WE CAN'T MOVE ON' Premature baby died after doctor walked off under-staffed labour ward in a row over PAY, report reveals MADGE'S ADOPTION JOY Madonna shares picture of herself with adopted twin daughters from Malawi and welcomes them into her family THE FIVE-YEAR-OLD GIRL WHO GAVE BIRTH The astonishing story of Lina Medina, the youngest person ever to give birth at the shocking age of FIVE 
She said of the interview: “She didn’t even shake my hand, didn’t have my CV out and was just sat drinking a coffee. 
“Maybe because I’m 18 she thinks it’s OK not to be professional with me? I don’t know.” 
Miller and Carter had advertised up to 50 jobs at the new branch in Enderby, Leics, and A-levels student Megan wanted to earn some extra cash for college. News Group Newspapers Ltd
